title: Autopilot
desc: Autopilot is a sleek and interactive platform that allows businesses to automate Customer journeys using visual flowcharts. The site features modern animations, real- time integrations, and clear call-to-actions to support user acquisition.

title: FE Group
desc: This site showcases a global industrial solutions provider, built with multilingual support, animation-driven UI, and structured service flows. It reflects the brand’s innovation-first, international outlook.

title: Midwam
desc: Midwam’s website combines immersive visuals with a clean interface to present their work in exhibitions, VR, AR, and live experiences. It’s tailored to reflect creativity and cutting-edge solutions.

title: Spray (Bluestar)
desc: This modern single-page app presents an AI-powered spray product using slick transitions, 3D mockups, and a dark theme. It’s designed for startups wanting maximum visual impact.

title: Davis Grill
desc: Davis Grill brings restaurant e-commerce to life with online food ordering, menu exploration, and delivery integration. It features location-based services and a mobile- first layout for optimal user experience.

title: Chatly - AI Chatbot
desc: A highly engaging AI chatbot that mimics human-like conversations using advanced natural language processing. Designed for productivity, casual companionship, and daily engagement across a wide user base. Ideal for anyone seeking a responsive andintelligent virtual assistant.

title: AI Art Generator - Vyro AI
desc: This app uses machine learning and neural style transfer to convert photos into stunning AI-generated artwork. It supports multiple artistic styles, making it a popular tool forsocial media creatives and digital artists.

title: Vrikshaveda
desc: An organic skincare and health brand selling natural products via Shopify. Includes advanced product bundling, blog-driven education content, and a wellness-focused interface that enhances both trust and usability.
